page.title: 13HIGHER POLES HILL
page.content: Higher Poles Hill is a small holding that is two acres in size.On the farm they mainly grow potatoes.The hardest time of the year is during the harvest when they have to collect the potatoes and silage grass.There are some more farmers near by and they have many animals such as goats,pigs cows,cats and dogs.The farmers wife helps milk the goats and looks after the the chickens.His daughter mucks out the pigs and feeds them.On the farm they don't sell any produce they keep it for themselves.There was a stream but it was dammed.Before they moved in there was a family living there who used the land for chickens and grazing.For transport they have to use cars.All the family who live on the small holding like living there.
